hero.title: TechVerse — where code meets the future
hero.description: Platform for developers, creators and tech enthusiasts. Join crisp live meetings, catch up on curated tech news, and level up with short guides and practical insights.

sections.aboutText: TechVerse is a minimalist, static-first platform built to deliver the look and feel of an enterprise-level product without the heavy backend. The site uses JSON-driven content, smooth animations and lightweight integrations to keep performance optimal while giving a premium UX.

footer.tagline: Built for speed, styled for impact.
